product.name: Engine Coolant Overflow Recovery Reservoir Tank with Tubing & Cap for Nissan Altima 2.5L 3.5L 2002-2006, Maxima 3.5L 2002-2008 - Front Side
product.bullet_points:
• Compatible with: 2002-2006 for Nissan Altima2.5L 3.5L; 2004-2008 for Maxima 3.5L
• BRTEC’s 36-month Warran-ty and is included free with all BRTEC brand Coolant Reservoir. Your Coolant Reservoir is guaranteed to remain in good operating condition while you own it. All of our customers buying BRTEC brand Coolant Reservoir are covered. This policy and any postage (at the domestic 1st Class rate) involved in using it is fully covered by BRTEC at no cost to you.
• Include: Coolant Reservoir with Cap
• Interchange Part Number: 21710-8J000, NI3014105, 603-614, 217108J000
• Direct replacement: fits and functions like original equipment for a trouble-free installation
